sentences.en: After coming home, discover its appreciably is bit thinner.
sentences.cn: 回家后, 发现它略微瘦了点.

sentences.en: He sniffed the green tea in the cup appreciably.
sentences.cn: 他欣然闻了闻杯里的绿茶香味.

sentences.en: She lifted the lids and sniffed appreciably.
sentences.cn: 她掀开盖子高兴地闻了闻.

sentences.en: Since the glass is in compression, it cannot extend appreciably beyond the ends of the eyelet.
sentences.cn: 因为玻璃处于压缩状态, 玻璃不能明显地延伸到超过座孔的端面.

sentences.en: Sometimes, however, the ability of bars to deform appreciably in torsion is put to good use.
sentences.cn: 但是, 有时要利用杆件在扭转时具有可观变形的能力.

sentences.en: The beam does not spread out appreciably, even at large distance from the source.
sentences.cn: 它的光束, 即使离光源极远,也不显著扩散.

sentences.en: The diffraction method is appreciably lower than that of the spectroscopic method.
sentences.cn: 衍射法的精确度显然低于光谱法的精确度.

sentences.en: The index adds appreciably to the usefulness of the book.
sentences.cn: 索引明显地增加了这本书的实用价值.

sentences.en: The limit occurs when the ordinate deviates appreciably from unity.
sentences.cn: 这个限度发生在纵坐标明显地从单位1偏离的时候.

sentences.en: The predicted stability limits often differ appreciably in magnitude from those observed in hot firings.
sentences.cn: 预计的稳定性极限往往在数值上与热试中测得的明显不同.

sentences.en: The proof of a spirit will not appreciably affect BAC.
sentences.cn: 酒水的酒精含量不影响人体吸收酒精的速度.

sentences.en: Thus the wind can aid appreciably in cooling the surface layers of the ocean.
sentences.cn: 这样一来,风能够明显地有助于冷却海洋的表面层.

sentences.en: Travel had not mellowed him appreciably.
sentences.cn: 游历并未使他明显成熟。

sentences.en: With block copolyether's forming, the cloud point lowers appreciably.
sentences.cn: 形成嵌段使聚醚浊点明显下降.

words.tran_cn: 可感知的；可评估的；相当可观的
明显地；相当地；可察觉地
